catalog_info.title: Science, Power and Politics
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as IGA-513. Interested undergraduates should send an email to Professor Jasanoff explaining their interest and qualifications before they come to class.
catalog_info.description: This seminar introduces students to the major contributions of the field of science and technology studies (STS) to the understanding of politics and policymaking in democratic societies.
